definition: To come to an end or reach completion, often used to describe the expiration or completion of a process, event, or period of time. It is commonly used in contexts related to the passing of time, the conclusion of an activity, or the expiration of a deadline.

examples.german: Der Film läuft heute Abend im Kino ab.
examples.english: The movie is showing at the cinema tonight.

examples.german: Das Wasser läuft aus dem Hahn ab.
examples.english: The water is running out of the tap.

examples.german: Die Garantie läuft in zwei Wochen ab.
examples.english: The warranty expires in two weeks.
